name: Pirate Radio (Cassidy キャシディ, chilimane)
name_original: Pirate Radio (Cassidy キャシディ, chilimane)
description:
You've just started a new job as a radio broadcaster with one small caveat: your radio station is being illegally broadcast off the coast of England. No problem - at least you don't have to pay royalties!

Navigate your way through daily broadcasts using only feedback as your guide. But be careful - if you slip up, the police can track your signal and put an end to your entire operation. 

This game is downloadable and playable for Windows. 

--------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

Adjust the broadcast signal by moving the mouse.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Game design: Cassidy Landers

Audio: Jonathan Leland
